template.name: oracle fetch_settings
template.description: mock fetch_settings procedure in the settings_utils package

template.name: oracle locked objects
orace disable contraint
template.value: ALTER TABLE NOTIFICATIONS_FOR_USER DISABLE CONSTRAINT USER_NOTIF_TO_NOTIF_FK

template.name: oracle compile with debug flag
template.value: alter package CIVIL_BANER compile debug body reuse settings;

template.name: oracle
template.value: select from law_suit suit inner join law_claim claim on suit.SUIT_ID = claim.SUIT_ID
